verbose_text: Western blot analysis revealed that p120ctn protein expression decreased in a concentration dependent manner following treatment with AngII for 24 h. AngII at a concentration of 10 muM significantly decreased p120ctn protein expression to 54.7 +/-6.9% compared with the control group (XREF_FIG).
evidence: p120ctn protein expression decreased in a concentration-dependent manner following treatment with AngII
